basic.floral_language:
Lavandula spica 
Floriography: romantic, dedicate, elegant
Is a famous spice plant, with flowers in purple-blue (lavender-coloured), produced on spikes at the top of slender stems, like spikes of wheat, full of strong scent, has good values for food, medicine, and cosmetology. 
Is a long-day plant, likes abundant sunlight, flowering in June-August, blue, purple, purple-blue, pink, or white color.

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly before flower budding
maintenance.pruning: Remove old diseased and dead leaves timely
